title: Bug 101187: Localization key can't be blank when adding.
description: Bug 101187: Localization key can't be blank when adding.
OB: The externalized text cannot be displayed in the chart when the key in the properties file is blank, even though it has a valid value.
EB: The externalized text should be displayed in the chart title even when the key in the properties file is blank, as long as it has a valid value.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open the properties file. 
2. Leave the key field blank, but make sure it has a valid value. 
3. Check if the externalized text is displayed in the chart title.
